trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Youngstown
There were no other sightings in Youngstown on or around September 12th 1977
Summary: While returning from drive-in movie spotted over the roadway about 40ft above road.
divs: Sighting Detailswhile traveling north on Lansdown blvd, as we approched Easthigh st. we saw a large white light slowly cross the road almost right above our location. i slowed my vehicle to get a better look and reolized that i could no longer see the sky above us. after about 30 seconds two more lights went over us. the lights apeared to be about 200 yards apart, and just did clear the tree tops. what struck me was that whatever this thing was, made no sound what so ever. my wife began to panic because we had our children in the car,and wanter to get home. i asked her if she reolized that if whatever that was could get here it could follow us home? we arrived home without further insodent. i am a retired captain with the mahoning sheriff's department, and did not make a report, because i did not want anyone to think i was crazy.
